title: Amazing Avo-Choco Pudding
description: This decadent desert is so delicious it’s hard to believe its so healthy.  You could actually have it for breakfast!!  Every bite is chock full of a perfect balance of acid and alkaline nutrients - enjoy anytime totally guilt free!

title: Asian Kale Salad
description: A delicious and nutritious salad with kale, cabbage, scallions, garlic, cilantro, and zucchini, to boost your immune system, decrease inflammation, and provide your body with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.

title: Avo-Choco Pudding
description: Combine the blueberries, honey, vanilla and 2 Tbsp of the coconut water in a blender and blend on medium speed until smooth.

title: Berry Lime Chia Pudding
description: Place the raspberries in a bowl and mash well with a fork. (If using the Amla berry powder, simply stir the powder into ¾ cup water.) Stir in almond or coconut milk, maple syrup, lime zest, lime juice, and chia seeds.

title: Blood Sugar-Balancing H2O
description: Pack ingredients in a 1 quart pitcher and fill with pure filtered water. Let infuse at room temperature for 2 hours and then in your refrigerator overnight.

title: Blood Sugar-Balancing Smoothie
description: Pack ingredients in a 1 quart pitcher and fill with pure filtered water. Let infuse at room temperature for 2 hours and then in your refrigerator overnight.

title: Caramelized Onion, Asparagus and Potato
description: Steam whole potatoes for 45 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork. Remove from heat and cool. Peel and dice Steam asparagus until bright green and tender 5-8 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.

title: Cashew Ranch
description: Blend the cashews, lemon juice, water, salt, and garlic in a high speed blender until smooth.

title: Cherry Lime Parsley Smoothie
description: Blend lime juice, water, honey and parsley in a high-speed blender on high for 10 seconds. Add the cherries and blend on hgh for 30 seconds.

title: Cinnamon Chaga Tea
description: Add the chaga mushroom powder and cinnamon to 1 cup hot water. Cover and let it steep for 10 minutes. Add 1 teaspoon of honey and stir until it is dissolved.

title: Cucumber Apple Juice
description: Juice the apples, cucumbers, celery and ginger and drink right away or put in a sealed glass jar and take with you for later.

title: Dill Potato Salad
description: Add 4 medium potatoes to a pot, cover them with water, replace the lid and bring to a boil. Cook for 20 minutes on medium-high heat.

title: Easy Applesauce
description: Blend all the ingredients in a high speed blender until soothe.  Pour and serve.  Sprinkle more cinnamon on top if you like.  If you do not have or like dates, simply double the maple syrup.

title: Endocrine Booster Smoothie
description: Description

title: Energizer Smoothie
description: Add the ingredients to a high speed blender and blend until smooth. If you are using both frozen mango and pineapple, let them thaw for a few minutes before blending.

title: Ginger Butternut Squash Soup
description: Preheat the oven to 350. Cut a medium butternut squash in 2 or 4 pieces. Scrape out the seeds. Place each piece face down in a large 9 X13 glass or ceramic dish. Cut the ends off the onion, then cut it in half and remove the skin. Place each half face down in the

title: Ginger Water
description: Grate a 1 inch piece of ginger root. Add it to a glass jar or  pitcher with the water, lemon juice, and raw honey. Let steep for at least 20 minutes. Stir and pour through a strainer before serving.

title: Ginger Limeade
description: Wash and slice a 2 inch piece of ginger (about the size of your thumb). Add the ginger slices, honey, and water to a pitcher and let it sit in the refrigerator overnight.

title: Good Morning Metabolic Elixir
description: For amazing “Youthful Aging” benefits, drink every morning before or after breakfast.  Helps to reduce cholesterol, normalize blood pressure and balance blood sugar

title: Green Goddess Salad
description: A delicious and nutritious salad with leafy greens, cilantro, avocado, lime, garlic, cayenne, and turmeric, to boost your immune system, decrease your inflammation, increase your circulation, and provide your body with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.

title: Grilled Mushroom Sweet Potato Salad
description: Peel and dice a sweet potato (approximately 1 cup). Place the sweet potato pieces in a frying pan. Cover the bottom of the pan with water, cover the pan with a lid and steam the potatoes on medium heat for 20 minutes.

title: Heart-Loving Smoothie
description: Put all ingredients in blender and process until smooth.  For extra heart-healthy benefits, throw in a handful of leafy greens.

title: Jurassic Smoothie
description: Blend all the ingredients in a high-speed blender on high for 30 seconds.

title: Mango Ginger Red Cabbage Tacos
description: Mango Ginger Red Cabbage Tacos

title: Maple Lime Asparagus
description: A quick and simple side dish that contains asparagus, which has high amounts of fiber, vitamins, and minerals.

title: Mushroom Gravy
description: Add the mushrooms, onions, garlic, and water to a pot and cover with a lid. Bring to a boil and cook for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and let sit for 5 more minutes.

title: Pistachio Pesto
description: A quick and simple sauce with basil, cilantro, pistachios, garlic, and lemon juice to lower your inflammation and support your immune system. This sauce goes well with pasta, vegetables, and your favorite protein.

title: Pomegranate Guacamole
description: Mash the pitted and peeled avocados in a medium bowl with the lime juice. Add the garlic, onion, cilantro, jalapeno, pomegranate seeds and salt. Stir until evenly mixed.

title: Potato Hash
description: Add the potato, onion, and sweet potato to a large non-stick ceramic pan. Cook 3-5 minutes adding a bit of water to prevent sticking, until the onion is translucent. Pour ¼ cup water into the pan and cover with a lid.

title: Potato Radish Salad
description: Boil 4 medium potatoes in a pot of water for 20 minutes. Blend the garlic, lemon juice, raw cashews, sea salt, and water until smooth.

title: Radish Salad
description: To make the dressing, mix the salt, honey, lemon juice, and olive oil. Slice the cucumber and radishes and mince the tarragon and dill.
Wash and cut the ginger and turmeric. The pieces should be about ½ the size of your thumb. Peel the orange. Put the turmeric, ginger and orange in the juicer in that order. Juice and drink.

title: Savoury Soul Soup
description: Add onion, garlic, celery, carrots, sweet potatoes, and shiitake mushrooms to a large pot and add water to cover the vegetables.

title: Shopping List for Making Salads
description: Description

title: Southwest Cucumber Salad
description: Mix the lime juice, maple syrup, smoked paprika, cumin, oregano, turmeric, chili powder and sea salt. Set aside while you prepare the salad.

title: Steamed Artichokes with 2 Dipping Sauces
description: Slice off the top ¼ of each artichoke and the end of each stem. Use scissors to cut off tips of the artichoke leaves to remove the thorns.

title: Sweet and Sour Stir Fry
description: Description

title: Sweet Potato Fajitas
description: Boil sweet potatoes, covered with water on medium-high heat, for 30 minutes. Remove them from the pot and let cool. Peel them and dice them and set them aside.

title: The Art of Packing: Mason Jars
description: Go for the quart-size jars with wide-mouth lids since these are easier to fill and eat out of. Use this system only if you can keep the jars upright.

title: Warm Pomegranate Salad
description: A delicious and nutritious salad with onions, bell peppers, shiitake mushrooms, sprouts, leafy greens, avocado, and pomegranate seeds, to support your immune system, gut health, cardiovascular health, and provide your body with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.

title: Warm Sweet Potato Dip
description: Remove sweet potato from skin and place in small bowl.  Add the rest of the ingredients and stir well until well combined.  Use as a dip for cut up veggies

title: Watermelon Mint Salad
description: Place all the ingredients in a large serving bowl, stir and serve.

title: Wild Blueberry Banana Muffins
description: Preheat the oven to 350. Mash the bananas with the lemon juice and maple syrup in a large mixing bowl. Stir in the chia seeds and let sit for 15 minutes.

title: Wild Blueberry Oatmeal
description: Add the water to a small pot and bring to a boil. Stir in the oats, cover the pot, and boil for 2 minutes on medium heat. Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the frozen wild blueberries.

title: Title
description: Description
